title: Impact of tailoring BTBT-based hole-transporting materials on perovskite photovoltaics under indoor illumination
content:
Sustainable Energy Fuels, 2024, Advance Article
DOI: 10.1039/D4SE00998C, Paper
Lal Chand, Prasun Kumar, Rahul Tiwari, Milon Kundar, Suman Kalyan Pal, Vibha Saxena, Ranbir Singh, Surya Prakash Singh
Small organic molecules as hole-transporting materials improve perovskite photovoltaic efficiency and stability under indoor conditions, offering a cost-effective and reliable alternative for long-term energy harvesting.
To cite this article before page numbers are assigned, use the DOI form of citation above.
